name: Beat Box - Jump the beat
description:
Beat Box is a spin-off of the fairly popular app iDaft Jamming.


Make the box jump to the beat of catchy tunes to complete the levels in this addictive rhythm-based jumper. The obstacles in the levels are neatly synced with the tracks so that the jumping respects the catchy beats; making this game not as impossible to complete as other games in the genre.

Option to restart level from unlocked check points! (but who needs check points anyway!?...)
Optimized for the iPad.

All music in the game is from NewGrounds.com. (CC)Artists are all credited within the app.
